Popup 3 - Draggable with auto-iframe

CLICK HERE TO SEE POPUP 3

Popup with auto iframe

	MyFancyPopupAux = new MyFancyPopupClass();
	MyFancyPopupAux.init({
		elementToShow: $('#popup3'),
		parentElement: $('section').first(),
		type: "iframe",
		url: "iframe.html",
		refreshIframeOnOpen: true,
		popupClass: "yellow",
		onIframeOnLoad: function() {
			MyFancyPopup.hideLoading();
		}
	});
	MyFancyPopupAux.showPopup();
